mapper.select:
SELECT count(0) FROM shop_store s
INNER JOIN dic_area a ON s.area_id = a.id
WHERE s.store_status = 15 AND s.is_o2o = 1
AND (a.id = #{areaId} OR a.parent_id = #{areaId})
SELECT id,bank_account_name,bank_c_account,bank_name FROM shop_store WHERE create_user_id=#{uid}

SELECT s.*, ss.id AS sellerid, ss.store_name, ss.store_telephone, ss.isExtension,
temp2.sum rebateFeeAmount FROM user_seller s INNER JOIN shop_store ss ON ss.id = s.store_id INNER JOIN user_owns own ON s.uid = own.seller_user_id
INNER JOIN sys_user su ON s.uid = su.id
LEFT JOIN(SELECT SUM(code_amount) SUM,seller_user_id FROM (SELECT code_amount,seller_user_id FROM user_rebate_record rr WHERE rr.rebate_status = 1 AND rr.rebate_type BETWEEN 303 AND 331
AND DATE_FORMAT(rr.create_time ,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{vo.startTime} ,'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(rr.create_time ,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{vo.endTime} ,'%Y-%m-%d')
GROUP BY rebate_code ORDER BY id )rc GROUP BY seller_user_id ) temp2 ON temp2.seller_user_id = s.uid WHERE ss.store_status = 15
AND (SELECT count(0) FROM dic_area a WHERE a.id = ss.area_id AND a.parent_id = #{vo.operatorAreaId}) > 0 AND (own.own_operator_id != #{vo.operatorId} OR ISNULL(own.own_operator_id))
AND ss.area_id = #{vo.operatorAreaId} AND (own.own_operator_id != #{vo.operatorId} OR ISNULL(own.own_operator_id))
AND 1=2
AND own.own_operator_id = #{vo.operatorId}
ORDER BY s.uid DESC

SELECT s.*, est.one AS est_one, est.two AS est_two, est.three AS est_three, est.five AS est_five, est.four AS est_four, ROUND(6378.138*2*ASIN(SQRT(POW(SIN((#{storeLat}*PI()/180-s.store_lat*PI()/180)/2),2)+COS(#{storeLat}*PI()/180)*COS(s.store_lat*PI()/180)* POW(SIN((#{storeLon}*PI()/180-s.store_lon*PI()/180)/2),2)))*1000) AS juli FROM shop_store s LEFT JOIN o2o_group_evaluation_store_total est ON s.id = est.store_id WHERE s.store_status=15 AND s.group_discount > 0 AND s.commission_rebate > 0 AND s.store_lat IS NOT NULL AND s.store_lon IS NOT NULL order by juli

SELECT s.*, est.one AS est_one, est.two AS est_two, est.three AS est_three, est.five AS est_five, est.four AS est_four FROM shop_store s LEFT JOIN o2o_group_evaluation_store_total est ON s.id = est.store_id WHERE s.store_status=15 AND s.group_discount > 0 AND s.commission_rebate > 0
AND s.area_id IN
#{id}
ORDER BY s.store_credit DESC

SELECT s.*
,ROUND(6378.138*2*ASIN(SQRT(POW(SIN((#{storeLat}*PI()/180-s.store_lat*PI()/180)/2),2)+COS(#{storeLat}*PI()/180)*COS(s.store_lat*PI()/180)* POW(SIN((#{storeLon}*PI()/180-s.store_lon*PI()/180)/2),2)))*1000) AS juli
FROM shop_store s, o2o_group_goods o WHERE s.id=o.store_id AND s.store_status=15 AND o.gg_status=0 AND s.store_lat IS NOT NULL AND s.store_lon IS NOT NULL
AND s.store_recommend=#{store_recommend}
group by s.id
order by juli

SELECT s.id,s.store_name,s.store_credit,s.store_lat,s.store_lon,s.create_user_id,s.store_cover_path, est.one AS est_one, est.two AS est_two, est.three AS est_three, est.five AS est_five, est.four AS est_four FROM user_customer_favorites f LEFT JOIN shop_store s ON s.id=f.fid LEFT JOIN o2o_group_evaluation_store_total est ON s.id = est.store_id WHERE f.uid=#{uid} AND f.type=#{type}
SELECT ss.id, ss.create_user_id, ss.is_shop, ss.is_o2o FROM shop_store ss WHERE ss.delete_Status=0
SELECT ss.id FROM shop_store ss WHERE ss.delete_Status=0 and ss.store_status=15

SELECT s.store_name, a.login_name, u.user_name, s.store_ower, s.area_id, s.group_main_id, s.add_Time, u.uid, s.id FROM shop_store s, user_seller u, sys_user_account a, user_owns o, dic_area dic WHERE s.id = u.store_id AND u.uid = o.seller_user_id AND u.uid = a.uid AND a.account_type=2 AND s.store_status = 15 AND s.delete_status = 0 AND s.is_o2o = 1 AND dic.id = s.area_id AND ISNULL(o.own_operator_id)
AND (dic.id = #{vo.areaId} OR dic.parent_id = #{vo.areaId})
AND s.store_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{vo.storeName},'%')
ORDER BY s.add_Time DESC

SELECT uo.operator_code, uo.operator_name, uo.user_name op_user_name, uo.operator_area_id, uo.phone operatorPhone, s.store_name, s.add_Time, s.id FROM shop_store s, user_owns o, user_operator uo WHERE s.create_user_id = o.seller_user_id AND uo.id = o.own_operator_id AND s.store_status = 1 AND s.delete_status = 0
AND uo.operator_code = #{operatorCode}
AND uo.operator_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{operatorUserName},'%')
AND uo.operator_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{operatorName},'%')
AND s.store_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{storeName},'%')
ORDER BY s.add_Time DESC

SELECT store.store_telephone,store.id,store.store_lat,store.store_lon,store.store_name,store.is_shop,store.is_o2o,store.store_cover_path, store.store_address,store.store_info,store.store_credit,store.eepay_mid,store.eepay_key,store.create_user_id,store.commission_rebate, est.one AS est_one, est.two AS est_two, est.three AS est_three, est.five AS est_five, est.four AS est_four, i.license_c_desc FROM shop_store store LEFT JOIN o2o_group_evaluation_store_total est ON store.id = est.store_id LEFT JOIN shop_store_apply_info i on i.store_id=store.id WHERE store.id=#{storeId}

SELECT store.id,store.store_telephone,store.store_lat,store.store_lon,store.store_name, store.store_address,store.store_info, est.one AS est_one, est.two AS est_two, est.three AS est_three, est.five AS est_five, est.four AS est_four FROM shop_store store LEFT JOIN o2o_group_evaluation_store_total est ON store.id = est.store_id WHERE store.id in
#{id}

SELECT
,a.fail_reseaon FROM shop_store ss LEFT JOIN shop_store_apply_info a ON a.store_id = ss.id where ss.id=#{id}

SELECT s.id,s.store_name,s.store_logo_path FROM user_customer_favorites u LEFT JOIN shop_store s ON u.fid=s.id WHERE u.type=#{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND u.uid=#{userid,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND s.store_status=15 order by create_time
mapper.update:
update shop_store
store_commission_amount = store_commission_amount + #{storeCommissionAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
store_payoff_amount = store_payoff_amount + #{storePayoffAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
store_sale_amount = store_sale_amount + #{storeSaleAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where id=#{id}
update shop_store set favorite_count=favorite_count+1 where id=#{id}
update shop_store set favorite_count=favorite_count-1 where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select s.*, p.* from shop_store s, shop_store_point p where s.delete_status = 0 and p.store_id = s.id and s.store_seo_keywords like concat('%', #{keywords}, '%')
mapper.sql: id, add_Time, delete_status, bank_account_name, bank_c_account, bank_line_num, bank_name, buygift_meal_end_Time, combin_end_time, domain_modify_count, enoughreduce_meal_end_Time, favorite_count, gc_main_id, group_meal_end_Time, organization_code, send_email_count, send_sms_count, store_address, store_commission_amount, store_credit, store_decorate_old_theme, store_decorate_theme, store_email_count, store_msn, store_name, store_ower, store_ower_card, store_payoff_amount, store_qq, store_recommend, store_recommend_time, store_sale_amount, store_second_domain, store_sms_count, store_start_time, store_status, store_telephone, store_ww, store_zip, validity, area_id, bank_area_id, bank_permit_image_path, card_id, grade_id, store_banner_path, store_license_path, store_logo_path, store_cover_path, is_shop, is_o2o, store_lat, store_lon, invitation_code, coupon_pay_amount, charge_pay_amount, rebate_amount, commission_rebate, create_user_id, eepay_mid, eepay_key, is_eepay, group_main_id, group_detail_info, group_discount, license_c_mobile, license_c_name,profit_amount,store_target

gc_detail_info, sms_email_info, store_decorate_background_info, store_decorate_background_old_info, store_decorate_base_info, store_decorate_base_old_info, store_decorate_info, store_decorate_old_info, store_info, store_quick_menu, store_seo_description, store_seo_keywords, violation_reseaon
mapper.select:
select
distinct
,
from shop_store
order by ${orderByClause}

select
distinct
from shop_store
order by ${orderByClause}

SELECT ss.id, ss.add_Time, ss.delete_Status, ss.bank_account_name, ss.bank_c_account, ss.bank_line_num, ss.bank_name, ss.buygift_meal_end_Time, ss.combin_end_time, ss.domain_modify_count, ss.enoughreduce_meal_end_Time, ss.favorite_count, ss.gc_main_id, ss.group_meal_end_Time, ss.license_c_mobile, ss.license_c_name, ss.organization_code, ss.send_email_count, ss.send_sms_count, ss.store_address, ss.store_info, ss.store_commission_amount, ss.store_credit, ss.store_decorate_old_theme, ss.store_decorate_theme, ss.store_email_count, ss.store_msn, ss.store_name, ss.store_ower, ss.store_ower_card, ss.store_payoff_amount, ss.store_qq, ss.store_recommend, ss.store_recommend_time, ss.store_sale_amount, ss.store_second_domain, ss.store_sms_count, ss.store_start_time, ss.store_status, ss.store_telephone, ss.store_ww, ss.store_zip, ss.validity, ss.area_id, ss.bank_area_id, ss.bank_permit_image_path, ss.card_id, grade_id, ss.store_banner_path, ss.store_license_path, ss.store_seo_keywords, ss.store_seo_description, ss.store_logo_path, ss.store_cover_path, ss.is_shop, ss.is_o2o, ss.store_lat, ss.store_lon, ss.commission_rebate, ss.invitation_code, ss.coupon_pay_amount, ss.charge_pay_amount, ss.rebate_amount, ss.store_logo_path, ss.is_shop, ss.is_o2o, ss.store_lat, ss.store_lon, ss.create_user_id, ss.is_eepay, ss.eepay_key, ss.eepay_mid, ss.group_detail_info, ss.group_discount, ss.group_main_id, ss.implement_number, ss.pos_type, ss.add_type, ss.line_number, us. NAME, us.user_name, uc.nickname, us.telephone, us.email, us.mobile, ssg.grade_name, ssg.content, ss.gc_detail_info, sp.*, sua.login_name, est.one AS est_one, est.two AS est_two, est.three AS est_three, est.five AS est_five, est.four AS est_four, sai.license_business_scope, sai.fail_reseaon, sa.path AS store_info_path, ss.store_target, sai.license_c_contact, sai.license_legal_name, sai.license_legal_id_Card, sai.license_legal_id_card_front_path, sai.license_legal_id_card_back_path, sai.license_image_path, sai.other_photo_path, sai.license_c_email, sai.organization_image_path, sai.industry, sai.operate_number operator_code
FROM shop_store ss LEFT JOIN user_seller us ON us.store_id = ss.id LEFT JOIN user_customer uc ON uc.uid = ss.create_user_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_account sua ON (us.uid = sua.uid and sua.account_type = 2) LEFT JOIN shop_store_grade ssg ON ss.grade_id = ssg.id LEFT JOIN shop_store_point sp ON sp.store_id = ss.id LEFT JOIN shop_store_apply_info sai ON sai.store_id = ss.id LEFT JOIN o2o_group_evaluation_store_total est ON ss.id = est.store_id LEFT JOIN user_album ua ON ss.create_user_id = ua.user_id AND ua.store_info_default = 1 LEFT JOIN sys_accessory sa ON ua.album_cover_id = sa.id WHERE ss.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into shop_store (id, add_Time, delete_status, bank_account_name, bank_c_account, bank_line_num, bank_name, buygift_meal_end_Time, combin_end_time, domain_modify_count, enoughreduce_meal_end_Time, favorite_count, gc_main_id, group_meal_end_Time, organization_code, send_email_count, send_sms_count, store_address, store_commission_amount, store_credit, store_sale_amount, store_second_domain, store_sms_count, store_start_time, store_status, store_telephone, store_ww, store_zip, validity, area_id, bank_area_id, bank_permit_image_path, card_id, grade_id, store_banner_path, store_license_path, store_cover_path, store_logo_path, is_shop, is_o2o, store_lat, store_lon, invitation_code, coupon_pay_amount, charge_pay_amount, rebate_amount, commission_rebate, create_user_id, eepay_mid, eepay_key, is_eepay, group_main_id, group_detail_info, group_discount, license_c_mobile, license_c_name, gc_detail_info, sms_email_info, store_decorate_background_info, store_decorate_background_old_info, store_decorate_base_info, store_decorate_base_old_info, store_decorate_info, store_decorate_old_info, store_info, store_quick_menu, store_seo_description, store_seo_keywords, violation_reseaon,profit_amount,store_target ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleteStatus,jdbcType=BIT}, #{bankAccountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankCAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankLineNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buygiftMealEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{storeStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{storeStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{storeTelephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storeWw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storeZip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{validity,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{areaId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{bankAreaId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{bankPermitImagePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{gradeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{storeBannerPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storeLicensePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storeCoverPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storeLogoPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isShop,jdbcType=BIT}, #{isO2o,jdbcType=BIT}, #{storeLat,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{storeLon,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{invitationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{couponPayAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{chargePayAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rebateAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{commissionRebate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{eepayMid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eepayKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isEepay,jdbcType=BIT}, #{groupMainId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{groupDetailInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupDiscount}, #{licenseCMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{licenseCName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gcDetailInfo,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{smsEmailInfo,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{storeDecorateBackgroundInfo,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{storeDecorateBackgroundOldInfo,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{storeDecorateBaseInfo,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{storeDecorateBaseOldInfo,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{storeDecorateInfo,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{storeDecorateOldInfo,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{storeInfo,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{storeQuickMenu,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{storeSeoDescription,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{storeSeoKeywords,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{violationReseaon,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{profitAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{storeTarget,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )

mapper.select: select count(*) from shop_store
mapper.update:
update shop_store
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
add_Time = #{record.addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
delete_status = #{record.deleteStatus,jdbcType=BIT},
bank_account_name = #{record.bankAccountName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bank_c_account = #{record.bankCAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bank_line_num = #{record.bankLineNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bank_name = #{record.bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
buygift_meal_end_Time = #{record.buygiftMealEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
combin_end_time = #{record.combinEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
domain_modify_count = #{record.domainModifyCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
enoughreduce_meal_end_Time = #{record.enoughreduceMealEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
favorite_count = #{record.favoriteCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
gc_main_id = #{record.gcMainId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
group_meal_end_Time = #{record.groupMealEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
organization_code = #{record.organizationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
send_email_count = #{record.sendEmailCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
send_sms_count = #{record.sendSmsCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
store_address = #{record.storeAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
store_commission_amount = #{record.storeCommissionAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
store_credit = #{record.storeCredit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
store_decorate_old_theme = #{record.storeDecorateOldTheme,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
store_decorate_theme = #{record.storeDecorateTheme,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
store_email_count = #{record.storeEmailCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
store_msn = #{record.storeMsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
store_name = #{record.storeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
store_ower = #{record.storeOwer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
store_ower_card = #{record.storeOwerCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
store_payoff_amount = #{record.storePayoffAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
store_qq = #{record.storeQq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
